name: wireshark-lua-toolkit
description: A Visual Studio Code extension to streamline development of Wireshark Lua dissector scripts.
author: Curtis Mechling <cmechlin@gmail.com>

commands.title: Wireshark: Run Lua Script in Tshark

wiresharkLua.captureFile.description: Path to the capture file to use with tshark -r. Leave blank to prompt each time.

wiresharkLua.autoRunReplOnActivate.description: Automatically run the Wireshark REPL when the extension activates. Useful for development/debug.

wiresharkLua.debugLuaEnv.description: Set the WIRESHARK_DEBUG_LUA environment variable when running the REPL for verbose Lua error output.

wiresharkLua.tsharkTFields.description: Value for the -T flag to tshark (e.g., 'fields'). Used if any -e fields are specified.

wiresharkLua.tsharkEFields.description: List of field names to extract with tshark -e <field>. If any are provided, -T <tsharkTFields> and -e <field> are added to the tshark command.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
